challenge.title: Suzanne Pharr - Homophobia - A Weapon of Sexism
challenge.description: Suzanne Pharr's Homophobia: A Weapon of Sexism is a book exploring the intersectionality of sexism and homophobia.
challenge.instructions: Read Suzanne Pharr's Homophobia: A Weapon of Sexism.
